mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.mainImg FROM `product` AS a LEFT JOIN `productimg` AS b ON a.pno = b.pno WHERE b.mainImg IS NOT NULL ORDER BY a.rdate DESC, a.pno ASC LIMIT 8

SELECT a.pno, a.pname, a.company, a.price, a.cate, a.info, a.discount, a.point, a.deliprice, b.mainImg, c.pcount, c.options FROM `cart` AS c JOIN `product` AS a ON c.pno = a.pno LEFT JOIN `productimg` AS b ON a.pno = b.pno WHERE c.uid = #{uid} ORDER BY c.cno DESC
SELECT p.*, img.mainimg, img.subimg, img.detailimg FROM product p LEFT JOIN productimg img ON p.pno = img.pno WHERE p.pno = #{pno}
